title: Ticket #2111: Config values are propagated from top-level DAGs to sub-DAGs
description: If you have a top-level DAG with a config file, and it runs a sub-DAG, the config settings from the top-level DAG are propagated to the lower-level DAG. (Do the config values get put into the job's environment or something like that?)
remarks:
2012-May-02 15:36:24 by nwp:
Why is this a defect?

2012-May-02 16:24:09 by wenger:
Well, if you have a complex workflow, I don't think that, say, the maxjobs setting for the top-level DAG is necessarily appropriate for the sub-DAGs. Also, things are currently inconsistent between config settings/environment variables and command-line flags as to which are propagated to lower-level DAGs.
creator: wenger
